msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso contains two columns of names
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides except at the top where it has been torn off. Kollesis near the left edge. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Stiynchis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " (Column 17);Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 8;;Pasion, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Philon, son of Dios, (grandson of Osios, guard), a third of the tax on dove-cotes, 13th year, drachmas 3, and additional taxes 1 copper obol, in total drachmas 3 1 copper obol;;Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Kommonis, drachmas 4;;Diodoros, fatherless, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Horos alias Karanos, son of Petheus, grandson of Herakles, mother Tauris, drachmas 8;;Heras, the son, mother Tamystha, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 36, obols 28 of which a third of the dove-cote tax in the 13th year obols 28;;(Tybi) 30 likewise:;Heras, son of Kelolis, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Horion, son of Sisouchos, grandson of Sisouchos, mother Apollonous, drachmas 12;;Dioskoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthes, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 12;;Agathopous, slave of Taseus alias Isarion, drachmas 12;;Achillas, son of Phasis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tasigonis, drachmas 12;;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 56;;Mecheir 3:;Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthes, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 12;;Sokmenis, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Ptollis, grandson of Herakles, mother Thases, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Herakles, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tapasion, obols 28;;Herakles, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Aunes, son of Aunes, grandson of Hermas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Euhemeros, son, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 164);;Imouthes, son of Keras, grandson of Menandros, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 68, obols 24;;(Mecheir) 5:;Mysthes the younger, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tepheros, drachmas 20;;12th year the same, copper drachmas ? copper drachmas:;Perigenes, son of Zoillos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Herakleides, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Ptolemais, drachmas 4;;Charmos, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Herieus the younger, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Chairemon, son of Chairemon, grandson of Sambas, mother Sokratiaine, drachmas 20."
